english.segment1: Have you fallen asleep. Blood cells still. Don't get annoyed I'm paranoid. Have you - have you
english.segment2: Wake up, move your body. Dance little girl, do something. Red ready
english.segment3: Have you fallen asleep. Take a breath. You will die if you don't try. Have you - have you
english.segment4: Dance little girl it'll come naturally. Don't you fall asleep.
